name: Border – Basic
description: Border with padding and rounded corners
xaml:
<Border Stroke="#1B1F2A" StrokeThickness="1" BackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" Padding="16" CornerRadius="8">
  <StackLayout Spacing="8">
    <Label Text="Title" FontAttributes="Bold" FontSize="18" />
    <Label Text="Subtitle or content goes here..." TextColor="#4B5563" />
  </StackLayout>
</Border>

name: Grid – 2 Columns
description: Grid with two columns and sample content
xaml:
<Grid ColumnDefinitions="Auto,*" RowDefinitions="Auto,Auto" ColumnSpacing="8" RowSpacing="8">
  <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="Label:" FontAttributes="Bold" />
  <Entry Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Type here" />
  <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Text="Another:" FontAttributes="Bold" />
  <Entry Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Value" />
</Grid>
